docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, July 3.--With the Stars and Stripes flying over two continents, from the Great Lakes to the Straits of Magellan, Latin-American republics will begin tomorrow the celebration of what they term the "month of liberty."
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, July 3.--With the Stars and Stripes flying over two continents, from the Great Lakes to the Straits of Magellan, Latin-American republics will begin tomorrow the celebration of what they term the "month of liberty."

headline.main: CELEBRATE FOURTH IN LATIN-AMERICA; Five Southern Republics Open Month of Celebration for Independence Today.

byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, July 4.--A survey of the world shipping trade by the United States Shipping Board shows that ships flying the American flag now reach practically every port in the world.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, July 4.--A survey of the world shipping trade by the United States Shipping Board shows that ships flying the American flag now reach practically every port in the world.

headline.main: AMERICAN SHIPPING SPREAD OVER WORLD; Practically Every Port Now Is Touched, Shipping Board Report Reveals. BIG INCREASE SINCE WAR No Fewer Than 42 Lines Flying United States Flag Are Operating Out of New York Alone. At Other Shore Ports. Lines to Still Other Ports.
